title: Futurisctic Gun Shots Sfx Pack
description: A pack of 125 Futurisctic Gun Shots sounds that are great for Future games and movies recorded on a quality microphone
longDescription:
Futurisctic Gun Shots Playlist: Listen

-------

What's in the package:

86 sounds of Futurisctic Gun Shots

40 sounds of Reload

------------------------------------------------------------

A pack of 125 Futurisctic Gun Shots sounds that are great for Future games and movies recorded on a quality microphone

------------------------------------------------------------

Hello, my name is Pavel also called Graninbeatz, I am a music composer and sound designer, I have worked in various game development companies, I am open for cooperation - Graninbeatz@gmail.com  

questions, news, suggestions what to add and more other is in discord group

Discord channel: https://discord.gg/SWJkbWsppX

Email: Graninbeatz@gmail.com

Instagram: pavel_granin1
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  High quality 
  •  Synthesized
  •  Recorded on a quality microphone in stereo 

Number of Audio Waves: 125

Number of Audio Cues: 125

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 5 min

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: No
